function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive coverage of all affected countries in the literature review","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of the global impact of COVID-19 on green housing and vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Conducting additional studies and literature reviews to include countries with vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Data analysis tools for global healthcare and housing data","People":"Resident populations in countries not covered by the literature review","Owner":"Research organizations and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of investigation into the impact of housing policies on green housing and resident wellbeing during COVID-19","Impact":"Limited understanding of the relationship between housing policies, green housing, and resident wellbeing during the pandemic","Mitigation":"Conducting in-depth studies on the impact of housing policies, green housing, and resident wellbeing during COVID-19","Technologies":"Social and environmental impact assessment tools","People":"Residents living in housing affected by policies during COVID-19","Owner":"Urban development and housing authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Insufficient analysis of the impact of green buildings, interest groups, and COVID-19 on the built environment","Impact":"Limited understanding of the effectiveness of green buildings and their impact on COVID-19 dispersion","Mitigation":"Comprehensive analysis of green buildings, interest groups, and the COVID-19 impact on the built environment","Technologies":"Building performance simulation software, data analytics tools for environmental impact","People":"Residents, interest groups, and decision-makers in the built environment sector","Owner":"Environmental organizations, architectural firms, and urban development authorities"}]}
